author: Richard Phillips
method: Place the chopped onion and mushroom into a small food processor with the garlic and blend together.  Heat the butter in a saucepan. Add the onion and mushroom mixture and fry for a few minutes. Add the potato, water, stock cube and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Cover with a lid and simmer for ten minutes.  Add the cream and pour into a bowl to serve immediately.
ingredients: ½ onion, roughly chopped,  1 large mushroom, roughly chopped,  1 garlic clove, peeled,  30g/1oz butter ,  ½ large potato, peeled and chopped,  150ml/5fl oz water,  ½ chicken or vegetable stock cube,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  2 tbsp double cream
